However, the crew is forced to defy Federation orders and turns renegade to protect the planet's inhabitants. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Patrick Stewart, F Murray Abraham, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner and Michael Dorn.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis
programme.desc: The crew of the Starship Enterprise is sent to form an alliance with old enemies the Romulans after the alien empire is taken over by a new leader - a clone of Captain Picard. Though claiming to want peace, Starfleet's finest soon realise he has more sinister plans in mind, involving a doomsday weapon that could destroy Earth. Sci-fi adventure, starring Patrick Stewart, Tom Hardy and Brent Spiner.(n)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: An inexperienced financial trader is taken under the wing of a corrupt New York corporate raider, who draws him into the shady world of illegal insider dealing with promises of money and power. But the trainee stockbroker questions the morality of his actions when the consequences of a deal strike close to home. Oliver Stone's Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Douglas, father and son Martin and Charlie Sheen, Daryl Hannah and Terence Stamp.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High
programme.desc: A lawman-turned-rancher is attacked by a lynch mob and hanged for a crime he did not commit, but is rescued before he dies. He returns to his former profession to hunt the mob down, but his desire for revenge clashes with his responsibility to bring them to trial alive. Western, starring Clint Eastwood, Inger Stevens, Ed Begley, James MacArthur, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: A war veteran criss-crosses America with his disabled brother in tow as he builds a new career as a renowned prizefighter. However, his ruthless determination to make it to the top drives him to betray the people closest to him. Drama, starring Kirk Douglas, Marilyn Maxwell, Arthur Kennedy, Paul Stewart and Ruth Roman.

programme.title: March of the Penguins
programme.desc: Luc Jacquet's Oscar-winning nature documentary follows a colony of emperor penguins on a journey hundreds of miles across the Antarctic ice to reach their breeding grounds, enduring harsh weather conditions and freezing temperatures along the way. Once they have mated, the males stay to guard the eggs while the females return to the sea to gather food. Narrated by Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: The New World
programme.desc: A 17th-century English settler in America falls in love with a native princess, but as conflict erupts between their people he is forced to abandon her. She is converted to Christianity, adopting European culture and forming a romance with a tobacco planter, but remains torn between two worlds. Terrence Malick's epic historical drama, starring Colin Farrell, Q'orianka Kilcher, Christian Bale and Christopher Plummer.

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Two middle-aged men embark on a wine-tasting tour in California a week before one of them is due to be married. The groom-to-be is determined to persuade his self-hating, embittered friend to loosen up - while also making it clear he intends to cheat on his fiancee before the week is out. Comedy, starring Paul Giamatti, Thomas Haden Church, Virginia Madsen and Sandra Oh.

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: A troubled philosophy professor begins teaching at a small town college, but struggles to find any meaning in his life. He finds some measure of happiness in his friendship with a student, and when they overhear a stranger's conversation, it spurs the tortured academic on to a course of action that changes everything. Woody Allen's drama, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Emma Stone and Parker Posey.

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: A bigoted misanthropic writer, who treats everyone he meets with contempt, is forced to look after a gay neighbour's dog, and develops an empathy with another creature for the first time in years. Sensing a need for human company, he pursues an unlikely romance with a waitress, who is the only person willing to put up with his rudeness. Romantic comedy drama, with Jack Nicholson, Helen Hunt, Cuba Gooding Jr and Greg Kinnear.

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: A teenage girl finds herself pregnant after a one-night stand with her best friend. Deciding to give her baby up for adoption, she thinks she has found the perfect parents in a yuppie couple. However, over the next nine months she begins to experience doubts about her plans. Comedy, starring Ellen Page, Michael Cera, Jennifer Garner and Jason Bateman.

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: A man is unaware his uneventful life is really a sham, and his every move is being secretly filmed and broadcast to the world as part of a 24-hour TV soap. However, a series of unforeseen events leads him to question the nature of his existence. Peter Weir's media satire, starring Jim Carrey, Natascha McElhone, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich and Ed Harris.

programme.title: Ex Machina
programme.desc: A computer programmer working for the world's biggest search engine is given the opportunity to spend a week at the remote home of his boss, a hi-tech genius. The break turns out to be an elaborate experiment, in which he must test the world's first truly artificial intelligence, which is housed in the body of a beautiful robot girl. Sci-fi drama, starring Domhnall Gleeson, Alicia Vikander and Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol 1
programme.desc: A female assassin wakes from a four-year coma and promptly sets out on a campaign to wipe out her erstwhile colleagues, who tried to kill her at her own wedding - one of whom is now the kingpin of the Tokyo underworld. The first part of Quentin Tarantino's two-part martial arts thriller, starring Uma Thurman, Lucy Liu, Vivica A Fox, Daryl Hannah and David Carradine.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol 2
programme.desc: Hitwoman the Bride continues her relentless quest to exact revenge on the group responsible for trying to kill her. Two more of the Deadly Viper Assassination Squad stand in her way before she can face-off against her mysterious mentor Bill. However, she has yet to realise that he has one last surprise waiting for her. Thriller sequel, starring Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Daryl Hannah and Michael Madsen.

programme.title: Tokyo Tribe
programme.desc: In an alternative, dystopian Tokyo, rival street gangs must join forces to defeat their common enemy, a cannibalistic gangster. Japanese sci-fi drama based on a popular Manga series, starring Ryohei Suzuki, Riki Takeuchi and Akihiro Kitamura.(n)

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: A man is unaware his uneventful life is really a sham, and his every move is being secretly filmed and broadcast to the world as part of a 24-hour TV soap. However, a series of unforeseen events leads him to question the nature of his existence. Peter Weir's media satire, starring Jim Carrey, Natascha McElhone, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich and Ed Harris.(n)

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: A drug addled private detective unwittingly becomes embroiled in an elaborate kidnapping case in Los Angeles during the 1970s involving an old flame, her billionaire boyfriend and his wife. Comedy drama based on Thomas Pynchon's acclaimed novel, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Josh Brolin and Reese Witherspoon.(n)

programme.title: Strangers on a Train
programme.desc: A charming psychopath meets a tennis professional on a train and suggests that they each commit a murder on the other's behalf. However, when the deranged man goes through with his part of the deal, the sportsman faces a race against time to prove his innocence. Alfred Hitchcock's thriller, based on the novel by Patricia Highsmith, starring Robert Walker, Farley Granger and Ruth Roman.(n)

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: A computer hacker is released from prison after being convicted of committing cyber crimes. He's immediately enlisted by the FBI when they discover that one of his software codes is being used as part of a terrorist plot. Crime drama, starring Chris Hemsworth, Leehom Wang and Viola Davis.(n)

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Lean's Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins.(n)

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: A veteran CIA agent is on the verge of retirement, but when he learns his former protege has been thrown into a Chinese prison and is awaiting execution, he decides to launch a perilous and ill-advised rescue attempt. Thriller, starring Brad Pitt, Robert Redford, Catherine McCormack and Stephen Dillane.(n)

programme.title: Michael Jackson's This Is It
programme.desc: Documentary following rehearsals for the singer's planned 50-night series of concerts at London's O2, immediately before his death in 2009. Featuring interviews with Jackson, performances of classic hits including Billy Jean and Wanna Be Startin' Something, and an insight into the elaborate preparations for the shows that were never staged.(n)

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Mann's thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx.(n)

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: A woman on the run after stealing from her boss ends up at an isolated motel, where the owner's curious relationship with his domineering mother results in murder. Alfred Hitchcock's psychological thriller, starring Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles, Martin Balsam, John Gavin and John McIntire.(n)

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: A drug addled private detective unwittingly becomes embroiled in an elaborate kidnapping case in Los Angeles during the 1970s involving an old flame, her billionaire boyfriend and his wife. Comedy drama based on Thomas Pynchon's acclaimed novel, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Josh Brolin and Reese Witherspoon.(n)

programme.title: Sliver
programme.desc: A book editor becomes a tenant in a technologically advanced New York apartment block and has an affair with the owner, unaware he is spying on all the residents with hidden cameras. She also discovers several women living in the building have been murdered and that the killer may be one of her neighbours. Erotic thriller, starring Sharon Stone, William Baldwin, Tom Berenger and Martin Landau.

programme.title: Night Passage
programme.desc: The black sheep of a family falls in with a gang of outlaws plotting to rob a train operated by his strait-laced brother, but reckons without his sibling's determination to track him down and set him back on the straight and narrow. Western, starring James Stewart, Audie Murphy, Dan Duryea and Brandon de Wilde.

programme.title: Aliens in the Attic
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager spends the summer in a lake house with his family, where he finds an invasion force of tiny aliens lurking in the attic. The extraterrestrials plan to take over the world with a mind-controlling device - and since it only works on adults, it falls to the boy and his siblings to save the day. Children's sci-fi comedy, with Carter Jenkins and Austin Butler.

programme.title: Dunston Checks In
programme.desc: A gentleman jewel thief's pet orang-utan runs amok in a swanky hotel, causing endless problems for the put-upon manager who has enough on his plate trying to ensure the establishment successfully attains a six-star rating. Family comedy, starring Jason Alexander, Rupert Everett, Faye Dunaway, Eric Lloyd and Paul Reubens.

programme.title: New in Town
programme.desc: A Miami business executive accepts a temporary assignment helping to downsize a manufacturing plant in a small Minnesota town. Despite a frosty reception, she soon finds herself warming to the community and falling in love with the man of her dreams - until she is asked to do the unthinkable. Romantic comedy, starring Renee Zellweger, Harry Connick Jr and JK Simmons.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA analyst gets caught up in the Colombian drug trade while trying to track down terrorists responsible for the murder of a close friend of the US president - but his investigations point to illegal activity and corruption at the very top of government. Action thriller, based on Tom Clancy's novel, with Harrison Ford reprising his role from Patriot Games alongside Willem Dafoe, Anne Archer and James Earl Jones. Edited for content.

programme.title: Taken 2
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Bryan Mills and his ex-wife Lenore are taken hostage in Istanbul by an Albanian gangster, whose son Bryan was killed while bringing down a kidnapping ring. He is able to escape with the aid of his daughter, and together they fight to rescue Lenore and wipe out the criminal family. Action thriller sequel, starring Liam Neeson, Maggie Grace and Famke Janssen.

programme.title: Devil
programme.desc: Five strangers get trapped when a lift breaks down. As a cop and a security guard try to free them, it becomes clear they are in far greater danger. One of the group is the Devil himself, who has assumed human form to harvest the souls of sinners - but nobody can tell who he is. Horror, starring Chris Messina, Bokeem Woodbine and Caroline Dhavernas.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: A reporter survives an ecological catastrophe that struck a coastal town, killing hundreds of people in just 24 hours. The authorities have covered up the cause of the disaster, so she gathers together all the video footage in existence from that fateful day on a mission to expose the truth. Thriller, starring Kether Donohue and Kristen Connolly.(n)

programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: A fanatical Arsenal supporter tries to convince his soccer-hating new girlfriend of the beautiful game's merits, but as he plans to move closer to the ground during a championship season, she is forced to consider that his beloved team means more to him than she does. Comedy starring Colin Firth, Ruth Gemmell, Neil Pearson, Holly Aird and Mark Strong.(n)

programme.title: The Producers
programme.desc: A crooked Broadway producer and his neurotic accountant discover they can make a fortune by putting on a play that closes on opening night, then pocketing the unspent budget. The duo set out to put on the worst show of all time - a tasteless little number called Springtime for Hitler written by a deranged former Nazi. Mel Brooks' comedy, starring Zero Mostel, Gene Wilder and Kenneth Mars.(n)

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: A teenager discovers he is the last in a long line of warriors destined to defend the world from dark forces. His duty now is to embark on a perilous journey through time to recover the six parts of a powerful mystical artefact and ensure it is returned to safe hands. Fantasy adventure, starring Alexander Ludwig, Christopher Eccleston and Ian McShane. Edited for daytime broadcast.(n)

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: Three babies left abandoned on an orphanage doorstep grow up into a bungling, accident prone trio of maintenance men. When the children's home is threatened with closure, they try to raise the money to save it, getting drawn into a murder plot and becoming the stars of a reality TV show. Slapstick comedy, with Sean Hayes, Will Sasso and Chris Diamantopoulos. Edited for daytime broadcast.(n)

programme.title: Inkheart
programme.desc: Mo Folchart possesses the unusual ability to make characters he reads about in books come to life. When he unleashes a fictional villain to cause mayhem in the real world, Mo and his daughter must find a way to put him back in the book. Fantasy adventure based on Cornelia Funke's novel, starring Brendan Fraser, Andy Serkis and Helen Mirren. Edited for daytime broadcast.(n)

programme.title: The Two Faces of January
programme.desc: A conman masquerades as a tour guide in Greece, and selects a wealthy American tourist and his younger wife as likely targets. However, when a murder is committed at the couple's hotel, all three are incriminated, and a dangerous alliance develops. Thriller based on Patricia Highsmith's novel, starring Viggo Mortensen, Kirsten Dunst and Oscar Isaac.(n)

programme.title: The Inbetweeners Movie
programme.desc: Awkward teenagers Simon, Will, Jay and Neil plan a holiday to the Greek island of Crete after they finish their exams, hoping to experience drink, sex and debauchery beyond their wildest dreams. However, things do not quite work out as planned. Comedy based on the TV series, with Joe Thomas, Simon Bird, James Buckley and Blake Harrison.(n)

programme.title: Dorian Gray
programme.desc: A naive Victorian man unthinkingly sells his soul for eternal youth, wishing that a portrait of him should age instead. His wish is granted and he is drawn into a life of debauchery by a hedonistic lord, while over the years, the painting becomes increasingly horrific as it reflects his corrupt true nature. Horror, based on Oscar Wilde's novel, starring Ben Barnes, Colin Firth and Ben Chaplin.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Kind-hearted John-Boy helps an illiterate woman learn to read and write in time for her daughter's college graduation. Richard Thomas stars.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Budding writer John-Boy helps a local blacksmith compose a poem that will win the hand of his sweetheart. Starring Richard Thomas.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Amorous Walnut Grove newcomer Adam Simms falls in love with Miss Beadle, while his son Luke proves he's a chip off the old block by persuading Nellie Oleson to run away with him.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A Native American boy arrives in Walnut Grove seeking medical help for his desperately ill father, but faces racial hatred from the townsfolk. Drama, starring Michael Landon.

programme.title: The Christmas Shoes
programme.desc: A little boy is determined to do whatever he can to buy his dying mother a pair of expensive red shoes. Along the way, his tireless efforts inspire an amazing transformation in the life of a cold-hearted lawyer struggling to cope with the slow disintegration of his marriage. Festive family drama, starring Rob Lowe, Maria Del Mar, Max Morrow and Kimberly Williams.

programme.title: Ride to Freedom: The Rosa Parks Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the life of Rosa Parks, the black woman who famously refused to give up her seat on a bus to a white man in 1950s America. The action prompted a massive outpouring of anger and sparked the rise of the civil rights movement. Angela Bassett, Cicely Tyson and Peter Francis James star.

programme.title: I Heard the Owl Call My Name
programme.desc: A terminally ill priest is sent by his bishop to be minister to a Native Canadian coastal village. He becomes accepted into their community, and as he witnesses its gradual destruction, gains the strength to face his own fate without fear. Drama based on Margaret Craven's novel, starring Tom Courtenay and Dean Jagger.

programme.title: Calendar Girl Murders
programme.desc: A detective is sent to investigate when the stars of a new raunchy calendar are murdered one at a time. He faces a race against time to find the killer before more blood is shed. Thriller, starring Tom Skerritt and Sharon Stone.

programme.title: For Love of Olivia
programme.desc: A small-town lawyer running for congress is blackmailed into defending a man accused of murder - and to make matters worse, his wife is harbouring a shocking secret. Thriller, starring Louis Gossett Jr, Robert Urich and Lonette McKee.

programme.title: Before He Wakes
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller about a greedy woman who marries and murders two wealthy husbands in succession, to acquire their fortunes, and almost succeeds in getting away scot-free. Starring Jaclyn Smith, Diana Scarwid, Hope Lange and Timothy Carhart.

programme.title: Stranger in the Family
programme.desc: A teenager is involved in a tragic car accident, leaving him with severe amnesia. During his struggle to come to terms with alienation and the consequent rebellion that ensues, his family are forced to accept the boy they once knew so well is now a stranger. Fact-based drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Teri Garr, Randle Mell and Sierra Samuel.

programme.title: One Against the Wind
programme.desc: Biopic of Second World War heroine Mary Lindell, who helped freedom fighters and members of the Allied forces escape the clutches of the Nazis in occupied France. Starring Judy Davis, Sam Neill, Denholm Elliot and Kate Beckinsale.

programme.title: Thicker Than Blood
programme.desc: An idealist decides to spend a year working at a deprived inner-city school before continuing his own education. He is appalled at the levels of poverty, crime and apathy, but when one pupil shows talent as an artist, he vows to help the boy escape his surroundings, putting him at odds with the headmaster. Drama, starring Dan Futterman, Mickey Rourke and Carlo Alban.

programme.title: Word of Honor
programme.desc: A Vietnam veteran is shocked to be accused of engineering a massacre while serving in South East Asia, 30 years after the end of the conflict - prompting him to set out to prove his innocence. Drama based on a novel by Nelson DeMille, and starring Don Johnson, Jeanne Tripplehorn and Sharon Lawrence.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Budding writer John-Boy helps a local blacksmith compose a poem that will win the hand of his sweetheart. Starring Richard Thomas.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy receives a proposal of marriage from his insecure friend Sarah. However, when he fails to take her seriously she elopes with another boy instead - and he sets out to find the errant couple before they tie the knot. Sissy Spacek guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura realises she is in love with Jimmy while they are out collecting frogs. Meanwhile, Caroline becomes unhappy as Charles' new job takes him away with increasing frequency.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary takes a teaching job in an isolated town, but soon finds her methods are too radical for the conservative residents. Melissa Sue Anderson stars.(n)

programme.title: Storm and Sorrow
programme.desc: An American mountaineer's efforts to scale a peak in the former Soviet Union are hampered by her team-mates, whose squabbles turn the expedition into a battle for survival. Drama, starring Lori Singer, Todd Allen, Marcia Cross and Jay Baker.(n)

programme.title: A Family in Crisis: The Elian Gonzales Story
programme.desc: A five-year-old Cuban refugee is rescued from a disaster at sea and taken to America - where he finds himself a political pawn as relatives and two national governments haggle over his future in a headline-grabbing case. Fact-based drama, starring Esai Morales, Alec Roberts and Alan Rachins.(n)

programme.title: Meat Loaf: To Hell and Back
programme.desc: Biopic charting the rocker's early years and how he overcame his bullying father and a lifelong weight problem to achieve international fame. W Earl Brown, Dedee Pfeiffer and Zachary Throne star.(n)

programme.title: Prison of Secrets
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a new convict in a women's prison, who struggles to expose a corrupt system under which guards demand sexual favours from her fellow inmates. Stephanie Zimbalist, Finola Hughes and Gary Frank star.(n)

programme.title: Meat Loaf: To Hell and Back
programme.desc: Biopic charting the rocker's early years and how he overcame his bullying father and a lifelong weight problem to achieve international fame. W Earl Brown, Dedee Pfeiffer and Zachary Throne star.(n)

programme.title: In His Life: The John Lennon Story
programme.desc: Biopic of the singer who formed one half of the most successful and celebrated songwriting partnership of modern times. The film charts the musician's youth in Liverpool and his rise to fame with the Beatles, a group which redefined popular music during the 1960s, before recalling his solo career and tragic death outside his home in Manhattan. Starring Philip McQuillan, Blair Brown, Daniel McGowan and Jamie Glover.(n)

programme.title: Blue Valley Songbird
programme.desc: A talented singer-songwriter's love of country music provides her with a means of escaping the clutches of her abusive manager-boyfriend and starting a new life. Drama, starring Dolly Parton, John Terry, Billy Dean and Kimberley Kates.(n)

programme.title: Birth of the Beatles
programme.desc: Pop biopic charting the Beatles' early days in Germany with original members Pete Best and Stu Sutcliffe, and their first stab at chart success with Ringo Starr and producer George Martin. Starring Stephen Mackenna, John Altman, Rod Culbertson, Ray Ashcroft and Nigel Havers.(n)

programme.title: Hendrix
programme.desc: Biopic of the legendary guitarist who changed the face of music during the 1960s. Starring Wood Harris, Vivica A Fox, Dorian Harewood and Billy Zane.(n)

programme.title: Silence of the Heart
programme.desc: A teenage suicide shatters a seemingly typical American family, turning their lives upside-down as they struggle to cope with their grief. Drama, starring Charlie Sheen, Mariette Hartley, Dana Hill, Howard Hesseman and Chad Lowe.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a doctor to make peace with his past and deal with the secrets he has been keeping from his neighbours.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan spends Halloween helping a boy to face his fears, while Mark has a nightmare in which his angelic friend turns into a werewolf.

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: The godly helpers assist two women who are in love with the same man. Roma Downey and Della Reese star.

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: A stuffy doctor finds a homeless child on his doorstep claiming to be from Child Watch - but Monica learns the truth and urges him to come clean. Roma Downey and Della Reese star.

programme.title: Our Gift of Love
programme.desc: A freak accident leaves a man in a coma shortly before Christmas. While friends and family urge his wife to prepare for the worst, she refuses to accept he will not recover and dedicates herself to taking care of him. Drama, starring Rebecca De Mornay, Henry Czerny, Barclay Hope and Lila Yee.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The Baldwin sisters' niece returns to America after living in Germany, and John Boy suspects she is running away from something terrible that happened there.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy needs some peace and quiet to finish writing his book. Ben quits his job at the newspaper and becomes a car salesman, but picks up some dishonest habits.

programme.title: Detective
programme.desc: Part one of two. On the eve of his execution, a murderer invites the detective who put him in jail to hear a confession of the killings he was not convicted for. With Tom Berenger.

programme.title: Detective
programme.desc: Part two of two. On the eve of his execution, a murderer invites the detective who put him in jail to hear a confession of the killings he was not convicted for. With Tom Berenger.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Once in a Lifetime
programme.desc: An author reflects on her literary career while recovering from a road accident, but cannot help dwelling on the loss of her husband and baby - and further tragedy only serves to compound her sorrow. Drama, starring Lindsay Wagner, Barry Bostwick and Amy Aquino.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Vanished
programme.desc: A devoted mother's son is kidnapped, and as the FBI search widens, she is distressed to find herself suspected of involvement in the crime, along with a former lover who may not be what he seems. Drama set in the 1930s, starring Lisa Rinna, George Hamilton and Robert Hays.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Remembrance
programme.desc: A woman struggles to confront the facts behind her mother's murder, including a doomed love affair cut short by the horrors of the Korean War, and a passionate relationship with a high-flying photographer who hides a dark secret. Drama, starring Angie Dickinson, Eva LaRue and Jeffrey Nordling.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Changes
programme.desc: Two single parents, a successful journalist and a wealthy, widowed heart surgeon, fall in love and rush headlong into marriage. However, the move proves to have far-reaching consequences for them and their children. Romantic drama, starring Cheryl Ladd, Michael Nouri and Christopher Gartin.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's No Greater Love
programme.desc: A woman endures a seemingly endless series of personal trials and traumas after her parents are killed on the Titanic, but carries on struggling to keep her family together. Period drama, starring Kelly Rutherford, Chris Sarandon, Simon MacCorkindale and Michael Landes.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Heartbeat
programme.desc: A pregnant TV producer, abandoned by her husband, falls for an equally lonely divorced colleague, but their romance is threatened by her inability to let go of the past. Drama, starring John Ritter, Polly Draper, Nancy Morgan and Kevin Kilner.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan reunites a washed-up Vaudeville performer with his estranged movie star son by persuading them to act in a play together. Donald O'Connor guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan tries to help a boy deal with his father's death, but the youngster responds to the tragedy by retreating into a fantasy world.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica and Tess try to help a sheriff come to terms with his own past while trying to help his son from committing suicide. Roma Downey and Della Reese star.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: When a young girl dies of a heart condition, Monica takes her place in a Christmas pageant.(n)

programme.title: The King and Queen of Moonlight Bay
programme.desc: A reclusive and emotionally wrecked handyman is reunited with the estranged 17-year-old daughter he left behind years before, and embarks on the task of repairing their fragile relationship - but the pair face an uphill struggle because they share the same stubborn streak. Drama, based on Michael De Guzman's novel, starring Tim Matheson, Sean Young and Kristen Bell.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John -Boy has heard nothing from the publisher whom he sent his book, so goes to new York to find out if it is going to be printed.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The lives and adventures of a family living in a mountain town in 1930s America.(n)

programme.title: An Inconvenient Woman
programme.desc: Part one of two. A wealthy and married man falls for a waitress and showers her with gifts. When he dies the mistress causes a number of problems for the well-to-do family, prompting them to take drastic action. Starring Jason Robards, Jill Eikenberry and Rebecca De Mornay.(n)

programme.title: An Inconvenient Woman
programme.desc: Part two of two. A wealthy and married man falls for a waitress and showers her with gifts. When he dies the mistress causes a number of problems for the well-to-do family, prompting them to take drastic action. Starring Jason Robards, Jill Eikenberry and Rebecca De Mornay.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Remembrance
programme.desc: A woman struggles to confront the facts behind her mother's murder, including a doomed love affair cut short by the horrors of the Korean War, and a passionate relationship with a high-flying photographer who hides a dark secret. Drama, starring Angie Dickinson, Eva LaRue and Jeffrey Nordling.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's A Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: A woman resigned to nursing her bedridden husband is swept off her feet by a handsome stranger and soon realises she is falling in love - but guilt and responsibility get the better of her. Romantic drama, starring Stacy Haiduk, Robert Urich and Darren McGavin.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Heartbeat
programme.desc: A pregnant TV producer, abandoned by her husband, falls for an equally lonely divorced colleague, but their romance is threatened by her inability to let go of the past. Drama, starring John Ritter, Polly Draper, Nancy Morgan and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Once in a Lifetime
programme.desc: An author reflects on her literary career while recovering from a road accident, but cannot help dwelling on the loss of her husband and baby - and further tragedy only serves to compound her sorrow. Drama, starring Lindsay Wagner, Barry Bostwick and Amy Aquino.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Remembrance
programme.desc: A woman struggles to confront the facts behind her mother's murder, including a doomed love affair cut short by the horrors of the Korean War, and a passionate relationship with a high-flying photographer who hides a dark secret. Drama, starring Angie Dickinson, Eva LaRue and Jeffrey Nordling.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Fine Things
programme.desc: A man marries the woman of his dreams, only to see her die of cancer - and while coping with the pain of bereavement, he finds himself subjected to extortionate demands from her drug-dealing ex-husband. Drama, starring DW Moffett, Tracy Pollan and Cloris Leachman.(n)

programme.title: Martin Lawrence: Doin' Time: Uncut
programme.desc: Comedy legend Martin Lawrence returns to the stand-up stage for a night of impressions and insight on everything from sex, relationships and President Obama, to Bill Cosby, Hollywood and more. Filmed live at LA's Orpheum Theatre.

programme.title: Michael Jackson's Journey From Motown to Off the Wall
programme.desc: Director Spike Lee documents an in-depth look into the evolution of The King of Pop, Michael Jackson, and the cultural significance - and lasting impact - of his seminal first solo album as an adult, 'Off The Wall.

programme.title: 2016 Season Preview
programme.desc: The award winning INSIDE THE NFL brings you every team, every game, every week of the football season. Join host James Brown, plus Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, Michael Irvin and New York Jets wide receiver Brandon Marshall for hard-hitting commentary, expert analysis and exclusive NFL Films highlights of every game. Season premiere.

programme.title: A Season With Florida State Football: Episode 1
programme.desc: One of the biggest and most explosive teams in college football is gearing up for another title run and A SEASON WITH FLORIDA STATE FOOTBALL gives you a front row seat with unprecedented on and off the field access to Coach Jimbo Fisher and his players as they navigate a season of high expectations.

programme.title: 60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: Super Bowl MVP Von Miller held out for the most lucrative contract ever given to a player who was not a quarterback. Armen Keteyian interviews the linebacker who's out to prove he is worth all the hype. Plus, Jeff Glor digs into the shadowy business of soccer "agents" in Africa, where big promises to talented boys seldom lead to little more than disappointment. And from Detroit to Paris, Sharyn Alfonsi reports on the last time a Ford raced competitively at Le Mans - and the challenge that turned into the 2016 motorsports story of the year.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on actual events, a group of US soldiers is sent on a heroic mission to Somalia in 1993 as part of a UN peacekeeping operation. They must capture the top lieutenants of a Somali warlord, in order to quell the civil war and famine that is ravaging the country. Directed by Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Michael Jackson's Journey From Motown to Off the Wall
programme.desc: Director Spike Lee documents an in-depth look into the evolution of The King of Pop, Michael Jackson, and the cultural significance - and lasting impact - of his seminal first solo album as an adult, 'Off The Wall.

programme.title: Springsteen & I
programme.desc: A unique music documentary celebrating 40 years of rock 'n' roll icon Bruce Springsteen. Working with the filmmakers, his fans have submitted clips to create a film that reflects on their personal insights and experiences, exploring what this timeless artist means to them. Combined with the never-before-seen archival footage of Bruce's performances throughout his career, and his incredible music, this is a film for the people, by the people.

programme.title: 2016 Season Preview
programme.desc: The award winning INSIDE THE NFL brings you every team, every game, every week of the football season. Join host James Brown, plus Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, Michael Irvin and New York Jets wide receiver Brandon Marshall for hard-hitting commentary, expert analysis and exclusive NFL Films highlights of every game. Season premiere.

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars in this tale based on the true story of Alan Turing, a genius British mathematician, who works against the clock to crack Germany's infamously unbreakable codes during World War II and defies convention in his personal life. Also stars Keira Knightley.

programme.title: Michael Jackson's Journey From Motown to Off the Wall

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Why Did I Get Married?
programme.desc: A therapeutic retreat to a bucolic Colorado setting for couples that are seeking to mend their marriages turns into a full-blown crisis when one participant shows up with a sexy temptress in tow. Writer, director and actor Tyler Perry stars with Janet Jackson in this domestic comedy-drama, with Jill Scott, Malik Yoba, Richard T. Jones and Michael Jai White.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on actual events, a group of US soldiers is sent on a heroic mission to Somalia in 1993 as part of a UN peacekeeping operation. They must capture the top lieutenants of a Somali warlord, in order to quell the civil war and famine that is ravaging the country. Directed by Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: This rawboned action conspiracy thriller stars Mark Wahlberg as a former Marine Corps sniper Bob Lee Swagger, who answers his country's call when a retired colonel (Danny Glover) enlists him to stop a presidential assassin. The twist is that Bob Lee finds himself tagged as the patsy in a murderous conspiracy, with only an FBI rookie (Michael Pena) on his side.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: After a public declaration from Marisol, Hector's rematch with Whittaker is cancelled. However, Ray enlists the help of Lena and Daryll to ensure the match proceeds. Meanwhile, an angry neighbor confronts the Donovans about Conor's reckless behavior. And Teresa's worsening depression causes her family to have her committed to a mental hospital(c).(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Nudity, Mild Violence

programme.title: Goodbye Beautiful
programme.desc: When the head of the Russian mob arrives to find out what really happened to Belikov, Sonia and her daughter take refuge at the Donovan's, throwing her and Abby into close quarters. As both Avi and Lena question Ray's loyalty to Sonia, he must decide whether to help her or put the lives of his family and friends in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Mickey returns to Primm - in search of stolen money, Sylvie and vengeance(c).(n)

programme.title: Lake Hollywood
programme.desc: Confronted with a crisis involving one of their own, Ray and his team strategize on how to use art from the Kovitzsky gallery as leverage. Meanwhile, after Hector's wife informs him that she and their daughter are moving to escape the incest scandal, he reaches a breaking point and enlists Ray's help in fixing the situation(c).(n)

programme.title: Martin Lawrence: Doin' Time: Uncut
programme.desc: Comedy legend Martin Lawrence returns to the stand-up stage for a night of impressions and insight on everything from sex, relationships and President Obama, to Bill Cosby, Hollywood and more. Filmed live at LA's Orpheum Theatre.(n)

programme.title: Cape Fear
programme.desc: Robert De Niro stars as a vicious psychopath and ex-convict who devotes his life to stalking and destroying the family of the man who put him in jail. Directed by Martin Scorcese. Also stars Nick Nolte, Jessica Lange and Juliette Lewis.(n)

programme.title: 60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: Super Bowl MVP Von Miller held out for the most lucrative contract ever given to a player who was not a quarterback. Armen Keteyian interviews the linebacker who's out to prove he is worth all the hype. Plus, Jeff Glor digs into the shadowy business of soccer "agents" in Africa, where big promises to talented boys seldom lead to little more than disappointment. Writer, director and actor Tyler Perry stars with Janet Jackson in this domestic comedy-drama, with Jill Scott, Malik Yoba, Richard T. Jones and Michael Jai White.(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver.(n)

programme.title: 2016 Season Preview
programme.desc: This week on INSIDE THE NFL, host James Brown and analysts Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, Brandon Marshall and Adam Schein discuss the hot topics going into the new season: QBs, athletes and social responsibility plus, Bronco Von Miller(c).(n)

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel.(n)

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Kiefer and Donald Sutherland share the screen in this brooding western about an embittered gunslinger who attempts to make amends with his estranged father whilst their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers.(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver.(n)

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker.(n)

programme.title: The Spymasters - CIA in the Crosshairs
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the inner workings of the world's most powerful intelligence organization, with unprecedented access to America's spy network, all 12 living CIA directors and top agency operatives, who talk candidly about torture, secret prisons, drone warfare, alleged assassinations and the constant threat of attack, which begs the question: how far should America go to keep us safe? Narrated by Mandy Patinkin ('Homeland').(n)

programme.title: Lake Hollywood
programme.desc: Confronted with a crisis involving one of their own, Ray and his team strategize on how to use art from the Kovitzsky gallery as leverage. Meanwhile, after Hector's wife informs him that she and their daughter are moving to escape the incest scandal, he reaches a breaking point and enlists Ray's help in fixing the situation(c).(n)

programme.title: Bless The Child
programme.desc: Psychiatric nurse Maggie O'Connell (Kim Basinger) fights her drug-addicted sister (Christina Ricci) and a Satanic cult leader (Rufus Sewell) for custody of her niece, a six-year-old girl who is the key to winning the battle between good and evil. Jimmy Smits costars in this supernatural thriller from the director of "The Mask.

programme.title: Jessabelle
programme.desc: Returning to her childhood home in Louisiana to recuperate from a horrific car accident, a young girl comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit that has no intention of letting her escape.

programme.title: The Hybrid
programme.desc: An elite team of mercenaries are chosen to carry out a covert operation deep in a former Soviet State that sends them into a maze of tunnels inhabited by menacing creatures and towards an underground laboratory where they must secure specimens of genetically engineered human and alien hybrids.

programme.title: Reeker
programme.desc: A group of disparate strangers including a blind genius and a druggie who ripped off his ecstasy dealer converges on a small, abandoned town where they are promptly slaughtered one at a time by a grotesque and extremely foul-smelling creature. Devon Gummersall, Derek Richardson and Tina Illman star in this tongue-in-cheek horror flick.

programme.title: Catch Hell
programme.desc: Ryan Phillippe directs and stars as a washed up Hollywood actor, who is kidnapped by two men connected to his past while on location in Louisiana, and finds himself in the middle of a twisted scheme with little chance to survive.

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth.

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Gordo
programme.desc: An ambitious young Mexican father leaves behind his popular taco stand for a chance to start his own restaurant in the United States.

programme.title: The Legend Of Gator Face
programme.desc: Teen pranksters (Johnny White and Dan Warry-Smith) try to put one over on Vernon, Mississippi with their mythical swamp monster, but not unless the real thing has anything to say about it. Paul Winfield costars in this engaging family comedy.

programme.title: Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the Thirteenth
programme.desc: This wacky satire of teen horror spoofs every convention of its vapid genre with broadly funny style, following the efforts of a high school principal (Coolio) and a TV reporter (Tiffani Amber Thiessen) to uncover the truth about a series of slayings on campus. Tom Arnold, Shirley Jones and Jimmie Walker costar in this delightfully absurd lampoon.

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller in which a group of college friends on a road trip find themselves fighting off dark forces at a remote farmhouse, after a chance encounter with a strange little girl.

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama.

programme.title: Maximum Overdrive
programme.desc: What would happen if a cosmic phenomenon of some kind brought every machine on planet Earth, from trucks and airplanes to electric carving knives and guns, to "life"? Stephen King ponders that very question with this sci-fi action-comedy, the author's directorial debut, starring Emilio Estevez, Pat Hingle, Laura Harrington and Yeardley Smith.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Ten killers sentenced to death for their murderous crimes are flown to a remote island and pitted against each other in a lethal series of fights, with the ultimate victor winning his freedom as the grand prize. Steve Austin, Vinnie Jones, Robert Mammone and Rick Hoffman star in this bone-cracking, hard-driving action thriller.

programme.title: The Atticus Institute
programme.desc: Mockumentary horror set in a 1960s paranormal research institute, where a new female subject displays demonic prowess. But when the US government steps in to weaponize her abilities, there are disastrous consequences.

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller in which a group of college friends on a road trip find themselves fighting off dark forces at a remote farmhouse, after a chance encounter with a strange little girl.

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims.(n)

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: The demented serial killer Jigsaw (Tobin Bell) returns in this hit horror sequel in which cop Eric Matthews (Donnie Wahlberg) too easily captures the fiendish murderer, only to helplessly observe as his son is trapped with seven other people in a ghoulish prison devised by the close-mouthed Jigsaw to require acts of horrific self-mutilation to escape. Shawnee Smith, Glenn Plummer, Dina Meyer, Eric Knudsen, Franky G. and Emmanuelle Vaugier costar.(n)

programme.title: Halloween: Resurrection
programme.desc: The eighth installment in the popular, long-running horror film series finds masked supernatural killer Michael Myers back to haunt his now-institutionalized sister (Jamie Lee Curtis) as well as the six teenagers spending the night in his family home as a reality-show Internet stunt. Busta Rhymes, Tyra Banks, Ryan Merriman, Thomas Ian Nicholas and Sean Patrick Thomas costar in this freaky follow-up from "Halloween 2" director Rick Rosenthal.(n)

programme.title: Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: An engaged couple goes away with their friends to a remote cabin to celebrate their upcoming wedding but the weekend takes a horrifying turn when dark secrets and forbidden desires are revealed and what started as a celebration quickly descends into a bloody nightmare.(n)

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Ten killers sentenced to death for their murderous crimes are flown to a remote island and pitted against each other in a lethal series of fights, with the ultimate victor winning his freedom as the grand prize. Steve Austin, Vinnie Jones, Robert Mammone and Rick Hoffman star in this bone-cracking, hard-driving action thriller.(n)

programme.title: Atari: Game Over
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the rise, fall and burial of the Atari Corporation told through the lens of the filmmakers unearthing hundred of thousands of unsold "E.T." game cartridges that were buried in a small town of New Mexico.(n)

programme.title: The Legend Of Gator Face
programme.desc: Teen pranksters (Johnny White and Dan Warry-Smith) try to put one over on Vernon, Mississippi with their mythical swamp monster, but not unless the real thing has anything to say about it. Paul Winfield costars in this engaging family comedy.(n)

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, a ticket taker at the local cinema believes he is the son of God and must decide on the eternal fate of everyone he comes in contact with. Stars William H. Macy and Neve Campbell.(n)

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: In a world where clone soldiers from three military tribes are locked in a perpetual battle of air, land and technology, one clone is separated from the battle and finds herself on a quest for the truth with an unlikely trio.(n)

programme.title: Don't Blink
programme.desc: A gripping suspense thriller about a group of friends who arrive at a secluded mountain resort to find it completely deserted. With no gas for the return trip, they are forced to stay and investigate the mystery surrounding the abandoned lodge. Stars Mena Suvari.(n)

programme.title: Refuge
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic thriller set in the ruins of a collapsed America where a family struggles to survive and rebuild a life in the wake of a catastrophic plague that has wiped out most of the surrounding civilization. When they take in an injured young man, it may threaten everything they have.(n)

programme.title: Supernova
programme.desc: A deep-space medical rescue team in the 22nd century discovers something sinister, alien, and deadly lurking inside a beautiful relic and possessing a charismatic disaster survivor. Angela Bassett, James Spader, Peter Facinelli, Robin Tunney, Wilson Cruz and Lou Diamond Phillips star in this science fiction adventure.(n)

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people.(n)

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: In a world where clone soldiers from three military tribes are locked in a perpetual battle of air, land and technology, one clone is separated from the battle and finds herself on a quest for the truth with an unlikely trio.(n)

Shawnee Smith, Glenn Plummer, Dina Meyer, Eric Knudsen, Franky G. and Emmanuelle Vaugier costar.

programme.title: Mine Games
programme.desc: A group of young friends make an incomprehensible discovery in an abandoned mine - but the more they try to change the future, the more they seal their fate. Starring Briana Evigan, Julianna Guill and Ethan Peck.

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room.

programme.title: QUIET RIOT: Well Now You're Here, There's No Way Back
programme.desc: An inspiring documentary chronicling the rise, fall and resurrection of '80s metal band Quiet Riot. The career of Frankie Banali, the band's drummer, reached a serious crossroads when his best friend and bandmate died in 2007. Years later, Banali realizes he must forge ahead and make a new life for himself and his daughter and he goes on a quest to reunite the band and fill the immense void left by his bandmate.

programme.title: Kobe Bryant's Muse
programme.desc: Documentary that goes behind the stats to reveal the story of Kobe Bryant's career, exploring the mentorships, allies and rivalries that have helped shape his stellar 18-year tenure in the NBA, and offering access to his daily experiences, his lifelong inspirations and the battle with his greatest personal challenge yet.

programme.title: Fallon / Galifianakis
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Jimmy Fallon and Zach Galifianakis. Season premiere.

programme.title: Just Let Go - Lenny Kravitz Live
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling a six-month Lenny Kravitz tour from Paris to New York and beyond, which examines the crucial relationship between him and his illustrious band. On rooftops, in muscle cars, propped up in dive bars, and in pool halls, the band talk candidly about life on the road, sharing the stage, improvising, translating the music from the studio and Lenny Kravitz's quest for perfection.

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, a ticket taker at the local cinema believes he is the son of God and must decide on the eternal fate of everyone he comes in contact with. Stars William H. Macy and Neve Campbell.

programme.title: 5 to 7
programme.desc: A young writer begins an affair with an older French woman, whose open marriage to a diplomat dictates that they can only meet for two hours each evening but their growing passion leads him to want more than just a fleeting romance.

programme.title: One Direction - Where We Are: Live from San Siro Stadium
programme.desc: Filmed over two nights at the iconic San Siro Stadium in Milan, this concert film features the chart topping pop sensation boy band One Direction performing all their biggest hits.

programme.title: Just Let Go - Lenny Kravitz Live
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling a six-month Lenny Kravitz tour from Paris to New York and beyond, which examines the crucial relationship between him and his illustrious band. On rooftops, in muscle cars, propped up in dive bars, and in pool halls, the band talk candidly about life on the road, sharing the stage, improvising, translating the music from the studio and Lenny Kravitz's quest for perfection.

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan.

programme.title: Public Enemy: Live from Metropolis Studios
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a special performance by one of the most influential hip hop acts of all time at the world famous Metropolis Sound Studio in London. Twenty-five years after the release of Public Enemy's most successful album Fear of a Black Planet, the rap legends Chuck D, Flavor Flav, DJ Lord and The S1W perform all of their fan favorites, interspersed with frank interview footage.

programme.title: One Direction - Where We Are: Live from San Siro Stadium
programme.desc: Filmed over two nights at the iconic San Siro Stadium in Milan, this concert film features the chart topping pop sensation boy band One Direction performing all their biggest hits.

programme.title: NYC Underground
programme.desc: When a group of friends make the trek across town to a Brooklyn concert, they become embroiled in a drug deal that goes awry, leaving them to flee through New York City's labyrinthine subway system in a race of life or death.

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan.(n)

programme.title: The Disappearance of Alice Creed
programme.desc: When a pair of ex-cons kidnaps a wealthy young woman, they don't anticipate that their victim will be smarter than they are and begin playing them against each other. Eddie Marsan, Martin Compston and Gemma Arterton star in this British crime thriller.(n)

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat.(n)

programme.title: Lenny Cooke
programme.desc: In an era when high school stars were forgoing college hoops in favor of the multi-million dollar contracts promised in the NBA draft, Lenny was supposed to be the next superstar. But over a decade later, while his peers are taking home MVP awards and championship trophies, Lenny has never played a minute in the NBA. What went wrong? A quintessentially American story about dreaming big, the fickle nature of sports celebrity and the unfulfilled destiny of a man for whom superstardom was only just out of reach.(n)

programme.title: Public Enemy: Live from Metropolis Studios
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a special performance by one of the most influential hip hop acts of all time at the world famous Metropolis Sound Studio in London. Twenty-five years after the release of Public Enemy's most successful album Fear of a Black Planet, the rap legends Chuck D, Flavor Flav, DJ Lord and The S1W perform all of their fan favorites, interspersed with frank interview footage.(n)

programme.title: The Riot Club
programme.desc: A first year student at Oxford University is invited to join the infamous Riot Club, where reputations can be made or destroyed over the course of a single drunken, debauched and disturbing evening with dangerous consequences.(n)

programme.title: 5 to 7
programme.desc: A young writer begins an affair with an older French woman, whose open marriage to a diplomat dictates that they can only meet for two hours each evening but their growing passion leads him to want more than just a fleeting romance.(n)

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: A group of gay activists work to support the miners of a tiny Welsh village during their lengthy strike in the summer of 1984. Inspired by an extraordinary true story.(n)

programme.title: Heatstroke
programme.desc: On a family trip in the African desert, a research scientist unintentionally travels off course and is brutally murdered by an arms dealer. His girlfriend is put to the ultimate survival test as she attempts to evade the killers and protect his teenage daughter. Stars Stephen Dorff.(n)

programme.title: Burning Bodhi
programme.desc: The death of one of their own reunites a group of lifelong friends who have gone their separate ways. Back together for the first time since high school, they hash out their pasts and confront what pulled them apart.(n)

programme.title: Common
programme.desc: A guileless 17-year old goes from innocent bystander to accessory to premeditated murder after giving a few friends a lift in this gritty drama starring Michael Gambon, Michelle Fairley and Johnjo O'Shea.(n)

programme.title: Mistaken for Strangers
programme.desc: A poignant and funny documentary that follows The National on tour, created by the frontman's younger brother, who was hired as a roadie but instead decides to set up camera and chronicle the journey, revealing sibling tension, his own self sabotage and the highs and lows of rock 'n' roll life.(n)

programme.title: Clouds of Sils Maria
programme.desc: At the peak of her international career, film star Maria Enders (Juliette Binoche) comes face-to-face with an uncomfortable reflection of herself while starring in a revival of the play that made her famous twenty years ago. Co-starring Kristen Stewart and Chlo� Grace Moretz.(n)

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Funnyman Andy Samberg stars in his first feature, a zany farce about a development-arrested youth who believes that stunt work is in his blood - despite his many failed, highly hazardous attempts at record-setting on his scooter to the contrary. Sissy Spacek, Ian McShane, Isla Fisher, Jorma Tacone, Bill Hader, Danny McBride and Will Parnell costar in this likable, goofy comedy.(n)

programme.title: Brad Williams: Fun Size
programme.desc: Hilarious stand-up comedy special featuring energetic comedian Brad Williams' inimitable take on disability, relationships, sex and race with perfect timing and explosive delivery that proves that you can in fact overcome any shortcomings... pun intended.(n)

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: Frank Miller's classic graphic novels return to the screen, weaving together gritty tales that feature Basin City's most hardboiled citizens as they cross paths with the town's more notorious inhabitants. Stars Jessica Alba, Josh Brolin and Mickey Rourke.

programme.title: Girl House
programme.desc: In an attempt to make some extra cash while away at college, a woman moves into a house that streams content to an X-rated website. After a deranged fan hacks the house's location, she finds herself in a terrifying fight for her life.

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: A group of people working to stay alive in a post-apocalyptic future discover what they think is a safe, abandoned farmhouse, but they soon find themselves fighting to stay alive as a gang of bloodthirsty predators attack.

programme.title: Nas: Time Is Illmatic
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the making of Nas' 1994 groundbreaking debut album Illmatic that follows the artist as he returns to his childhood home to share stories of his upbringing and influences and tracks the thrilling evolution from his life as a young street poet to a visionary MC. Features interviews with his musical peers, including Pharrell Williams and Alicia Keys and the "Illmatic" producers.

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: Frank Miller's classic graphic novels return to the screen, weaving together gritty tales that feature Basin City's most hardboiled citizens as they cross paths with the town's more notorious inhabitants. Stars Jessica Alba, Josh Brolin and Mickey Rourke.

programme.title: Lance Armstrong: Stop at Nothing
programme.desc: An intimate documentary about the explosive story of cyclist Lance Armstrong, revealing a portrait of a man who will stop at nothing in the pursuit of money, fame and success. Features candid interviews with his friends and enemies to reveal the truth behind the greatest fraud in sporting history.

programme.title: Along Came A Spider
programme.desc: When brilliant psychopath Gary Soneji (Michael Wincott) kidnaps the daughter of a U.S. senator, it's up to forensic psychologist Alex Cross (Morgan Freeman) and FBI agent Jezzie Flannigan (Monica Potter) to find the ruthless criminal. It soon becomes clear that the kidnapping's a ruse, that Soneji has something far more sinister up his sleeve, and that he's getting help from within the government. Michael Moriarty, Penelope Ann Miller and Dylan Baker costar in this thrilling sequel to "Kiss the Girls.

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by the iconic Tim Burton, this tale is based on the outrageous true story of one of the most epic art frauds in history, which stars Amy Adams as an artist who creates enigmatic paintings of waifs with big eyes, which are appropriated by her husband as his own work, catapulting him to unearned fame.

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents.

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: In this tense, psychological thriller based on the notorious true story, Billy Crudup stars as a Stanford University professor who, in 1971, cast 24 student volunteers as prisoners and guards in a simulated jail to examine the source of abusive behavior in the prison system with astonishing results that reveal the dark side of power and the effects of imprisonment.

programme.title: Godfrey: Regular Black
programme.desc: No-holds barred stand-up comedian Godfrey performs a riotous set in his hometown of Chicago.

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award� winner Helen Mirren.

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by the iconic Tim Burton, this tale is based on the outrageous true story of one of the most epic art frauds in history, which stars Amy Adams as an artist who creates enigmatic paintings of waifs with big eyes, which are appropriated by her husband as his own work, catapulting him to unearned fame.

programme.title: The Salvation
programme.desc: In the 1870s Wild West, a peaceful American settler kills his family's murderer, which unleashes the fury of a notorious gang leader who is hell bent on hunting the settler down, in this blood spattered saga of sin and redemption. Stars Eva Green.(n)

programme.title: Along Came A Spider
programme.desc: When brilliant psychopath Gary Soneji (Michael Wincott) kidnaps the daughter of a U.S. senator, it's up to forensic psychologist Alex Cross (Morgan Freeman) and FBI agent Jezzie Flannigan (Monica Potter) to find the ruthless criminal. It soon becomes clear that the kidnapping's a ruse, that Soneji has something far more sinister up his sleeve, and that he's getting help from within the government. Michael Moriarty, Penelope Ann Miller and Dylan Baker costar in this thrilling sequel to "Kiss the Girls.(n)

programme.title: Good Luck Chuck
programme.desc: A dentist (Dane Cook) who is also a lifelong bachelor suddenly realizes at an ex-girlfriend's wedding that every woman he's ever slept with has found her true love with the very next man she dated - making him instant catnip to ladies only interested in benefiting from his "curse." Jessica Alba and Dan Fogler costar in this romantic comedy.(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy Night Two with W. Kamau Bell
programme.desc: Stand-up W. Kamua Bell hosts the hottest comics at the SXSW festival in the second of this two-part showcase featuring today's heavyweights and tomorrow's stars, including Todd Glass, Wyatt Cenac, Iliza Shlesinger, Rachel Feinstein, Nate Bargatze, Matt Braunger, Mark Normand, Beth Stelling, Joe DeRosa and Jon Huck.(n)

programme.title: Jimi Hendrix: Electric Church
programme.desc: Documentary unveiling previously unseen footage of Jimi Hendrix's seminal performance at the 1970 Atlanta Pop Festival playing his greatest hits in front of 300,000 people. Features interviews with Hendrix, and fellow musicians, including Paul McCartney and Mitch Mitchell, who provide new insight into the musician's personality and genius at the juncture of this important cultural gathering, hailed as the 'Southern Woodstock.(n)

programme.title: A Murder in the Park
programme.desc: Documentary glimpse into a very broken criminal justice system as nearly 16 years after his confession exonerated a death row inmate and sparked the end of the death penalty in Illinois, Alstory Simon languishes in prison serving a 37-year sentence over a confession he claims was coerced.(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Shook the Hand of Vicente Fernandez
programme.desc: Academy Award(R) winner Ernest Borgnine stars in this tale of a retired radio DJ who finds himself in a nursing home run by an evil henchman, giving him the chance to pursue his lifelong dream of heroism by leading the Latino staff in a revolt against the tyrannical owner.(n)

programme.title: Like Sunday, Like Rain
programme.desc: A 12-year-old rich kid cello prodigy wants for nothing but the attention of his absent parents until a young musician is hired as his au pair and an unexpected friendship blossoms. Stars Leighton Meester and Debra Messing.(n)

programme.title: Bernie
programme.desc: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, though when she starts to become controlling, he goes to great lengths to separate himself from her grasp. Stars Shirley MacLaine, Jack Black and Matthew McConaughey. Richard Linklater directs.(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong.(n)

programme.title: Boulevard
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars as a married man whose long-suppressed sexual identity slowly emerges when he picks up a male hooker and pays him for companionship rather than sex, causing his life of predictable normalcy to unravel.(n)

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself.(n)

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on actual events, a group of US soldiers is sent on a heroic mission to Somalia in 1993 as part of a UN peacekeeping operation. They must capture the top lieutenants of a Somali warlord, in order to quell the civil war and famine that is ravaging the country. Directed by Ridley Scott.(n)

programme.title: Bernie
programme.desc: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, though when she starts to become controlling, he goes to great lengths to separate himself from her grasp. Stars Shirley MacLaine, Jack Black and Matthew McConaughey. Richard Linklater directs.(n)

programme.title: A Season With Florida State Football: Episode 1
programme.desc: One of the biggest and most explosive teams in college football is gearing up for another title run and A SEASON WITH FLORIDA STATE FOOTBALL gives you a front row seat with unprecedented on and off the field access to Coach Jimbo Fisher and his players as they navigate a season of high expectations.

programme.title: 2016 Season Preview
programme.desc: The award winning INSIDE THE NFL brings you every team, every game, every week of the football season. Join host James Brown, plus Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, Michael Irvin and New York Jets wide receiver Brandon Marshall for hard-hitting commentary, expert analysis and exclusive NFL Films highlights of every game. Season premiere.

programme.title: 60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: Super Bowl MVP Von Miller held out for the most lucrative contract ever given to a player who was not a quarterback. Armen Keteyian interviews the linebacker who's out to prove he is worth all the hype. Plus, Jeff Glor digs into the shadowy business of soccer "agents" in Africa, where big promises to talented boys seldom lead to little more than disappointment. And from Detroit to Paris, Sharyn Alfonsi reports on the last time a Ford raced competitively at Le Mans - and the challenge that turned into the 2016 motorsports story of the year.

programme.title: A Murder in the Park
programme.desc: Documentary glimpse into a very broken criminal justice system as nearly 16 years after his confession exonerated a death row inmate and sparked the end of the death penalty in Illinois, Alstory Simon languishes in prison serving a 37-year sentence over a confession he claims was coerced.

programme.title: Rise of the Footsoldier
programme.desc: A crime drama based on true events that follows the rise of Carlton Leach, one of the most feared thugs of the London and Essex soccer world, as he goes from a life of hooliganism to becoming a member of a notorious gang that rampaged the scene in the late 80s.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: A grieving FBI agent is bent on avenging the death of his partner by hunting down the assassin that pulled the trigger, but uncovers some disturbing secrets on his crusade for justice. Jason Statham and Jet Li star in this stylish action thriller with John Lone.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel.

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar.

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Funnyman Andy Samberg stars in his first feature, a zany farce about a development-arrested youth who believes that stunt work is in his blood - despite his many failed, highly hazardous attempts at record-setting on his scooter to the contrary. Sissy Spacek, Ian McShane, Isla Fisher, Jorma Tacone, Bill Hader, Danny McBride and Will Parnell costar in this likable, goofy comedy.

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Kiefer and Donald Sutherland share the screen in this brooding western about an embittered gunslinger who attempts to make amends with his estranged father whilst their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers.

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker.

programme.title: Heatstroke
programme.desc: On a family trip in the African desert, a research scientist unintentionally travels off course and is brutally murdered by an arms dealer. His girlfriend is put to the ultimate survival test as she attempts to evade the killers and protect his teenage daughter. Stars Stephen Dorff.

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars as a former thief who has just 12 hours to come up with $10 million after his former partner kidnaps his daughter.

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A Las Vegas-based drone pilot fights the Taliban by remote control for 12 hours a day, then goes home to the suburbs and feuds with his wife and kids for the other 12. But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones.

programme.title: 2016 Season Preview
programme.desc: The award winning INSIDE THE NFL brings you every team, every game, every week of the football season. Join host James Brown, plus Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, Michael Irvin and New York Jets wide receiver Brandon Marshall for hard-hitting commentary, expert analysis and exclusive NFL Films highlights of every game. Season premiere.
